ni maguþ guda skalkinon jah faihuþraihna.
LUKE 16.14 gahausidedun þan þo alla jah þai Fareisaieis, faihufrikai wisandans, jah bimampidedun ina.
jus sijuþ juzei garaihtans domeiþ izwis silbans in andwairþja manne;
iþ guþ kann hairtona izwara, unte þata hauho in mannam andaset in andwairþja gudis.
LUKE 16.16 witoþ jah praufeteis und Iohannen;
þaþroh þiudangardi gudis wailamerjada jah ƕazuh in izai nauþjada.
LUKE 16.17 iþ azetizo ist himin jah airþa hindarleiþan þau witodis ainana writ gadriusan.
LUKE 16.18 ƕazuh sa afletands qen seina jah liugands anþara horinoþ, jah ƕazuh saei afleitana liugaiþ, horinoþ.
LUKE 16.19 aþþan manne sums was gabigs jah gawasids was paurpaurai jah bwssaun jah waila wisands daga ƕammeh bairhtaba.
LUKE 16.20 iþ unleds sums was namin haitans Lazarus;
sah atwaurpans was du daura is, banjo fulls.
LUKE 16.21 jah gairnida saþ itan drauhsno þizo driusandeino af biuda þis gabeigins, akei jah hundos atrinnandans bilaigodedun banjos is.
LUKE 16.22 warþ þan gaswiltan þamma unledin jah briggan fram aggilum in barma Abrahamis;
gaswalt þan jah sa gabeiga jah gafulhans warþ.
LUKE 16.23 jah in haljai ushafjands augona seina wisands in balweinim gasaƕ þan Abraham fairraþro jah Lazzaru in barmim is.
...LUKE 17.3 jabai frawaurkjai broþar þeins, gasak imma;
jah þan jabai idreigo sik, fraletais imma.
LUKE 17.4 jah jabai sibun sinþam ana dag frawaurkjai du þus, jah sibun sinþam ana dag gawandjai sik qiþands: idreigo mik, fraletais imma.
LUKE 17.5 jah qeþun apaustauleis du fraujin:
jabai habaidedeiþ galaubein swe kaurno sinapis, aiþþau jus qiþeiþ du bairabagma þamma:
uslausei þuk us waurtim jah ussatei þuk in marein,
LUKE 17.7 ƕas þan izwara skalk aigands arjandan aiþþau haldandan, saei atgaggandin af haiþjai qiþai:
LUKE 17.8 ak niu qiþiþ du imma:
manwei ƕa du naht matjau jah bigaurdans andbahtei mis, unte matja jah drigka, jah biþe gamatjis jah gadrigkais þu?
LUKE 17.9 iba þank þu fairhaitis skalka jainamma, unte gatawida þatei anabudan was?
LUKE 17.10 swa jah jus, þan taujaiþ alla þo anabudanona izwis, qiþaiþ þatei
skalkos unbrukjai sijum, unte þatei skuldedum taujan gatawidedum.
LUKE 17.11 jah warþ, miþþanei iddja is in Iairusalem, jah is þairhiddja þairh midja Samarian jah Galeilaian.
LUKE 17.12 jah inngaggandin imma in suma haimo, gamotidedun imma taihun þrutsfillai mans,
LUKE 17.13 jah silbans ushofon stibna qiþandans:
LUKE 17.14 jah gaumjands qaþ du im:
jah warþ, miþþanei galiþun, gahrainidai waurþun.
LUKE 17.15 iþ ains þan ize gaumjands þammei hrains warþ, gawandida sik miþ stibnai mikilai hauhjands guþ LUKE 17.16 jah draus ana andawleizn faura fotum is awiliudonds imma;
LUKE 17.18 ni bigitanai waurþun gawandjandans giban wulþu guda, niba sa aljakunja?
LUKE 17.20 fraihans þan fram Fareisaium: ƕan qimiþ þiudangardi gudis? andhof im jah qaþ:
ni qimiþ þiudangardi gudis miþ atwitainai;
LUKE 17.21 nih qiþand: sai her, aiþþau sai jainar;
sai auk, þiudangardi gudis in izwis ist.
aþþan qimand dagos, þan gairneiþ ainana þize dage sunaus mans gasaiƕan jah ni gasaiƕiþ.
LUKE 17.23 jah qiþand izwis: sai her, aiþþau sai jainar;
